author: Andrea Bellemare
title: No, the new coronavirus wasn't created in a lab, scientists say
description: The idea that SARS CoV-2, the new coronavirus behind the current pandemic, was created in a lab is a favourite among conspiracy theorists. But an international team of researchers has shown it was not genetically engineered.
content: One of the most persistent and widespread pieces of disinformation during the COVID-19 pandemic has been the conspiracy theory that the novel coronavirus that causes the disease was created in a lab and was let loose either by accident or on purpose by some n… [+6196 chars]
